section.name: EOF
section.code:
*<<<< EOF * ANL-FEC-FPVC SECTION. * INI-ANL-FEC-FPVC. * MOVE EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-FECH. * MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. * MOVE FEC-FBLK-S TO FEC-FBLK. * MOVE FEC-CHOY-N TO FEC-CHOY. * IF OPC-IND-AFER IN OPC = 'S' * MOVE FEC-VHBL-S TO FEC-VHBL * ELSE * MOVE FEC-VHBL-N TO FEC-VHBL. * MOVE FEC-VAL-FEC TO FEC-CMND. * PERFORM PRO-FEC. * IF FEC-STAT-OKS * MOVE FEC-FECH TO EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD * ELSE * MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR * MOVE FEC-MENS TO FRM-MENS * GO TO FIN-ANL-FEC-FPVC. * IF OPC-IND-AFER IN OPC = 'S' AND * FEC-STAT-FER * MOVE FEC-SIG-HBL TO FEC-CMND * PERFORM CAL-FEC * MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR * MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST * MOVE 'FECFEVCPXHBL' TO MSG-COD-MENS * PERFORM GET-MSG * STRING MSG-GLS-DESC * FEC-FECH * MSG-GLS-DATA DELIMITED BY SIZE * INTO FRM-MENS. * FIN-ANL-FEC-FPVC. * EXIT. *ALD/18-JUL-1988 CMP-FEC-NFEC SECTION. INI-CMP-FEC-NFEC. MOVE WSS-FEC-NFE1 IN WSS-VARI TO FEC-FEC1. MOVE WSS-FEC-NFE2 IN WSS-VARI TO FEC-FEC2. MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. MOVE FEC-CMP-FEC TO FEC-CMND. PERFORM PRO-FEC. IF FEC-STAT-LES MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-CMP-FEC-NFEC.
MOVE WSS-FEC-NFE1 IN WSS-VARI TO FEC-FEC1. MOVE WSS-FEC-NFE3 IN WSS-VARI TO FEC-FEC2. MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. MOVE FEC-CMP-FEC TO FEC-CMND. PERFORM PRO-FEC. IF FEC-STAT-GRT MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. FIN-CMP-FEC-NFEC. EXIT.
SUM-FEC-NFEC SECTION. INI-SUM-FEC-NFEC. MOVE 'TAB' TO MSC-COD-SIST. MOVE 'IPER' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC. PERFORM BUS-MSC. MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. PERFORM SUM-FEC-FCOL. * PERFORM PRO-FEC. PERFORM CAL-FEC. FIN-SUM-FEC-NFEC. EXIT.
SUM-FEC-FCOL SECTION. INI-SUM-FEC-FCOL. MOVE OPC-NUM-DCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM1. MOVE OPC-NUM-MCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM2. MOVE OPC-NUM-SCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM3. MOVE OPC-NUM-ACOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM4. IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'D' MOVE FEC-SUM-DIA TO FEC-CMND MOVE WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI TO FEC-NDIA ELSE IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'M' MOVE FEC-SUM-MES TO FEC-CMND MOVE WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI TO FEC-NMES ELSE IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'A' MOVE FEC-SUM-ANO TO FEC-CMND MOVE WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI TO FEC-NANO. FIN-SUM-FEC-FCOL. EXIT. * SEL-PER-FPVC SECTION. INI-SEL-PER-FPVC. IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'D' MOVE FEC-SUM-DIA TO FEC-CMND MOVE FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-NDIA ELSE IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'M' MOVE FEC-SUM-MES TO FEC-CMND MOVE FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-NMES ELSE IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'A' MOVE FEC-SUM-ANO TO FEC-CMND MOVE FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-NANO. FIN-SEL-PER-FPVC. EXIT.
SEL-PER-FUVC SECTION. INI-SEL-PER-FUVC. IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'D' MOVE FEC-SUM-DIA TO FEC-CMND MOVE FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-NDIA ELSE IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'M' MOVE FEC-SUM-MES TO FEC-CMND MOVE FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-NMES ELSE IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'A' MOVE FEC-SUM-ANO TO FEC-CMND MOVE FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-NANO. FIN-SEL-PER-FUVC. EXIT.
SEL-PER-DFEC SECTION. INI-SEL-PER-DFEC. IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'D' MOVE FEC-DIF-DIA TO FEC-CMND * PERFORM PRO-FEC PERFORM CAL-FEC MOVE FEC-NDIA TO WSS-NUM-DVDO ELSE IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'M' MOVE FEC-DIF-MES TO FEC-CMND * PERFORM PRO-FEC PERFORM CAL-FEC MOVE FEC-NMES TO WSS-NUM-DVDO ELSE IF MSC-CIC-CMSC = 'A' MOVE FEC-DIF-ANO TO FEC-CMND * PERFORM PRO-FEC PERFORM CAL-FEC MOVE FEC-NANO TO WSS-NUM-DVDO. FIN-SEL-PER-DFEC. EXIT.
GET-PER-FEC SECTION. INI-GET-PER-FEC. MOVE FEC-RET-JUL TO FEC-CMND. MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. MOVE EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-FECH. * PERFORM PRO-FEC. PERFORM CAL-FEC. MOVE FEC-FJUL TO WSS-NUM-JUL. MOVE FEC-RET-JUL TO FEC-CMND. MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. MOVE OPC-NUM-DCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM1. MOVE OPC-NUM-MCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM2. MOVE OPC-NUM-SCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM3. MOVE OPC-NUM-ACOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM4. * PERFORM PRO-FEC. PERFORM CAL-FEC. SUBTRACT FEC-FJUL FROM WSS-NUM-JUL GIVING FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD IF FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD GO TO FIN-GET-PER-FEC. MOVE 'D' TO FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD. MOVE 'TAB' TO MSC-COD-SIST. MOVE 'IPER' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC. MOVE FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC. PERFORM BUS-MSC. MOVE MSC-GLS-DESC IN MSC TO FRM-GLS-UTPV IN EVC-FLD. FIN-GET-PER-FEC. EXIT. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_CAI_IOPC
section.code: *<<<< EVC_CAI_IOPC *>>>>

section.name: EVC_IND_CAUT
section.code: *<<<< EVC_IND_CAUT IF EVC-IND-CAUT IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO EVC-IND-CAUT IN EVC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_IND_FVAR
section.code: *<<<< EVC_IND_FVAR IF EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_IND_UTDV
section.code: *<<<< EVC_IND_UTDV IF FRM-IND-UTDV IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-IND-UTDV IN EVC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_IND_UTPV
section.code: *<<<< EVC_IND_UTPV IF FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_IND_UTSV
section.code: *<<<< EVC_IND_UTSV IF EVC-IND-UTSV IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO EVC-IND-UTSV IN EVC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_MSC_TCVE
section.code: *<<<< EVC_MSC_TCVE *ALD/28-JUL-1988 IF EVC-MSC-TCVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO EVC-MSC-TCVE IN EVC-FLD. IF NOT PGM-STAT-PVC-OKS GO TO CON-VAL-EVC-MSC-TCVE. IF PVC-MSC-TCVE IN PVC NOT = EVC-MSC-TCVE IN EVC-FLD AND PVC-MSC-TCVE IN PVC > SPACES MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'MSCTCVENOPLT' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-MSC-TCVE IN PVC TO FRM-MEN2 MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. CON-VAL-EVC-MSC-TCVE. * *>>>>

section.name: EVC_NUM_DESD
section.code: *<<<< EVC_NUM_DESD *ALD/28-JUL-1988 IF NOT PGM-STAT-PVC-OKS GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-NUM-DESD. IF PVC-NUM-DESD IN PVC NOT = EVC-NUM-DESD IN EVC-FLD AND PVC-NUM-DESD IN PVC > ZEROES MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMDESDNOPLT' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-NUM-DESD IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL1-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE SPACES TO WSS-IND-DMA1 IN WSS-VARI MOVE SPACES TO WSS-GLS-GUI2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE ZEROES TO WSS-NUM-VAL2-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE SPACES TO WSS-IND-DMA2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE WSS-MEN2 IN WSS-VARI TO FRM-MEN2 MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. * *>>>>

section.name: EVC_NUM_DPVE
section.code: *<<<< EVC_NUM_DPVE IF EVC-NUM-DPVC IN EVC-FLD > 28 AND EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE EVC-NUM-DPVC IN EVC-FLD TO EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD. IF EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD > 31 MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMDPVENOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-NUM-DPVE. * IF NOT (EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES OR * EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD = 29 OR * EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD = 30 OR * EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD = 31 ) * MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST * MOVE 'NUMDPVENOVAL' TO MSG-COD-MENS * PERFORM GET-MSG * MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS * MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR * GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-NUM-DPVE. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_NUM_IDLC
section.code:
*<<<< EVC_NUM_IDLC * IF EVC-NUM-IDLC IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES * GO TO CIC-VAL-EVC-NUM-IDLC. MOVE OPC-COD-TOOC IN EVC-FLD TO TOC-COD-TOCR IN TOC. PERFORM COL-FIO-TOC. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CODTOC NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG
MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS
MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-NUM-IDLC.
MOVE 'COL' TO MSC-COD-SIST FIO-SIST. MOVE 'OPEC' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC. MOVE TOC-MSC-OPEC IN TOC TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM GNS-FIO-MSC. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDOPECNEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG
MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS
MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-NUM-IDLC. IF MSC-CIC-CMSC IN MSC NOT = 'D' IF EVC-NUM-IDLC IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES GO TO CIC-VAL-EVC-NUM-IDLC ELSE MOVE 1 TO EVC-NUM-IDLC IN EVC-FLD GO TO CIC-VAL-EVC-NUM-IDLC. IF EVC-NUM-IDLC IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE ZEROES TO EVC-NUM-IDLC IN EVC-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-NUM-IDLC. CIC-VAL-EVC-NUM-IDLC. MOVE EVC-CAI-IOPC IN EVC-FLD TO DLC-CAI-IOPC IN DLC. MOVE EVC-IIC-IOPC IN EVC-FLD TO DLC-IIC-IOPC IN DLC. MOVE EVC-NUM-IDLC IN EVC-FLD TO DLC-NUM-IDLC IN DLC. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM COL-FIO-DLC. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMIDLCNEX ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG
MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS
MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-NUM-IDLC. MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'DOC' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE DLC-COD-TDOC IN DLC TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM BUS-TAB.
IF TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = 'LTR' AND EVC-VAL-VENC IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE DLC-VAL-SDLC IN DLC TO EVC-VAL-VENC IN EVC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_NUM_SEVE
section.code:
*<<<< EVC_NUM_SEVE IF EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD > 1 AND EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMSEVEVIGUZ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG
MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS
MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-NUM-SEVE. *>>>>

section.name: EVC_NUM_VIGU
section.code: *<<<< EVC_NUM_VIGU *>>>>

section.name: FIN_CLR_EVC_EVC
section.code: *<<<< FIN_CLR_EVC_EVC IF SCR-IND-ENG IN SCR-VEC-ENG(SCR-IPRO) = 'S' MOVE SCR-NUM-IDOC IN SCR-VARI TO EVC-NUM-IDLC IN EVC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_EVC
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_ALL_EVC IF PGM-STAT-OPC-OKS AND PGM-STAT-EVC-OKS PERFORM GET-PER-FEC. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_OPC_EVC
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_OPC_EVC *BUS-TAB busca glosa de codigo en tabla * NO EXISTE OPC-COD-VCOC IN EVC-FLD MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'VLR' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE OPC-COD-VCOC IN OPC TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM BUS-TAB. MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-VCOC IN EVC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_VAL_CON_IKY_EVC
section.code:
*<<<< FIN_VAL_CON_IKY_EVC IF EVC-IIC-IOPC IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'IICIEVCBLK' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG
MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS
MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_VAL_CON_KEY_EVC
section.code:
*<<<< FIN_VAL_CON_KEY_EVC IF NOT ( EVC-IIC-IOPC IN EVC-FLD > SPACES OR ( EVC-IIC-IOPC IN EVC-FLD > SPACES AND EVC-NUM-IEVC IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES ) ) MOVE 'GNS' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VALCONKEY' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG
MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS
MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>

section.name: FRM_NUM_DURV
section.code: *<<<< FRM_NUM_DURV *ALD/18-JUL-1988 IF PVC-CIC-IPVC IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES OR SCR-CMND = 'MCA' MOVE '23' TO PGM-STAT-PVC GO TO FIN-VAL-FRM-NUM-DURV. MOVE PVC-CIC-IPVC IN EVC-FLD TO PVC-CIC-IPVC IN PVC. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM COL-FIO-PVC. MOVE FIO-STAT TO PGM-STAT-PVC. *>>>>

section.name: INI_EVC_FEC_FPVC
section.code: *<<<< INI_EVC_FEC_FPVC MOVE FEC-FBLK-S TO FEC-FBLK. MOVE FEC-CHOY-N TO FEC-CHOY. MOVE FEC-VHBL-N TO FEC-VHBL. * PERFORM ANL-FEC-FPVC. * GO TO FIN-VAL-EVC-FEC-FPVC. *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_CON_KEY_EVC
section.code: *<<<< INI_VAL_CON_KEY_EVC IF FRM-FFLD = FRM-FFLD-PF7 OR FRM-FFLD-PF8 GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-KEY-EVC. *>>>>

section.name: PVC_CIC_IPVC
section.code: *<<<< PVC_CIC_IPVC *ALD/18-JUL-1988 IF PVC-CIC-IPVC IN EVC-FLD > SPACES MOVE PVC-CIC-IPVC IN EVC-FLD TO PVC-CIC-IPVC IN PVC MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM COL-FIO-PVC MOVE FIO-STAT TO PGM-STAT-PVC IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'PVC NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-PVC-CIC-IPVC ELSE IF PVC-MSC-STAT IN PVC = 'N' MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'PVC NVG' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-PVC-CIC-IPVC. * *>>>>

section.name: VAL_CON_FLD_EVC
section.code:
*<<<< VAL_CON_FLD_EVC *ISP DEBE INGRESAR AL MENOS PERIODO PRIMER VENCIMIENTO O * FECHA PRIMER VENCIMIENTO IF NOT ( FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES OR EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMSPVEFPVCZ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
*ISP CONSISTENCIA ENTRE PERIODO PRIMER VENCIMIENTO Y SU UNIDAD IF NOT ( ( FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES AND FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD > SPACES ) OR ( FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES AND FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES ) ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMSPVEUTPV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
IF FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-UTPV IN EVC-FLD.
IF FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE 'TAB' TO MSC-COD-SIST MOVE 'IPER' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC MOVE FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC PERFORM BUS-MSC MOVE OPC-NUM-DCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM1 MOVE OPC-NUM-MCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM2 MOVE OPC-NUM-SCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM3 MOVE OPC-NUM-ACOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM4 MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM PERFORM SEL-PER-FPVC * PERFORM PRO-FEC PERFORM CAL-FEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-FPVC IF EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD = ZEROES MOVE WSS-FEC-FPVC TO EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD ELSE IF EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD NOT = WSS-FEC-FPVC MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMSPVEFPVCI' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC ELSE NEXT SENTENCE ELSE PERFORM GET-PER-FEC. *ALD * PERFORM ANL-FEC-FPVC. * IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL * GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. * * ISP EN ESTE PUNTO TENGO LA FECHA PRIMER VENCIMIENTO *ALD/3-JAN-1989 IF EVC-NUM-DPVC IN EVC-FLD > 28 AND EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE EVC-NUM-DPVC IN EVC-FLD TO EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD. * IF EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES * IF NOT ( EVC-NUM-DPVC IN EVC-FLD NOT < 28 ) * MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST * MOVE 'NUMDPVEDPVCI' TO MSG-COD-MENS * PERFORM GET-MSG * MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS * MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR * GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
IF NOT ( ( FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES AND FRM-IND-UTDV IN EVC-FLD > SPACES ) OR ( FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES AND FRM-IND-UTDV IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES ) ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMDURVUTDV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. IF FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-UTDV IN EVC-FLD.
IF NOT ( ( EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES AND EVC-IND-UTSV IN EVC-FLD > SPACES ) OR ( EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES AND EVC-IND-UTSV IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES ) ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMSEVEUTSV' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. IF EVC-IND-UTSV IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-UTSV IN EVC-FLD.
IF ( EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD NOT = SPACES AND EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD = ZEROES ) OR ( EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD = SPACES AND EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD NOT = ZEROES ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDFVARFVAR' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
*ISP VALIDACION CONSISTENCIA PORCENTAJE VALIDO IF EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'COL' TO MSC-COD-SIST MOVE 'FVAR' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC MOVE EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC PERFORM BUS-MSC IF MSC-CIC-CMSC IN MSC = 'P' AND ( EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD > 100 OR EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD < -100 ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDFVARFVARE' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
*AAA Busca clase como opera la OPC 28-MAR-1991 15:00:11 MOVE SPACES TO WSS-OPEC. MOVE OPC-COD-TOOC IN OPC TO TOC-COD-TOCR IN TOC. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM COL-FIO-TOC. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'OPCTOOCNEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS MOVE TOC-COD-TOCR IN TOC TO FRM-MEN2 PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC ELSE MOVE 'COL' TO MSC-COD-SIST FIO-SIST MOVE 'OPEC' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC MOVE TOC-MSC-OPEC IN TOC TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM GNS-FIO-MSC IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'TOCOPECNEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS MOVE MSC-COD-TABL IN MSC TO FRM-MEN2 PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC ELSE MOVE MSC-CIC-CMSC IN MSC TO WSS-OPEC.
*ISP SE REPITE VALIDACION DE EVC-MSC-TCVE, PUES NO ES POSIBLE AGRE * CODIGO ADICIONAL DESPUES DE VALIDACION AUTOMATICA
PERFORM VAL-EVC-MSC-TCVE. *AAA Valida que si la OPC es Documento descontado, solo se ingrese * codigo 'FI' 28-MAR-1991 15:06:17 *AAA Eliminado por requerimiento de FHA hasta nuevo aviso * 2-APR-1991 16:29:06 * IF WSS-OPEC IN WSS-VARI = 'D' AND * TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB NOT = 'IF' * MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST * MOVE 'EVCTCVEINVOP' TO MSG-COD-MENS * PERFORM GET-MSG * MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 * MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 * PERFORM CPT-BLKS * MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS * MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR * GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC * ELSE *AAA Valida que si la OPC no es Documento descontado, solo se ingr * codigos distinto de 'FI' 28-MAR-1991 15:07:06 * IF WSS-OPEC IN WSS-VARI NOT = 'D' AND * TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = 'IF' * MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST * MOVE 'EVCTCVEOPINV' TO MSG-COD-MENS * PERFORM GET-MSG * MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 * MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 * PERFORM CPT-BLKS * MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS * MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR * GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
IF TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = 'IF' OR TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = 'IC' OR TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = 'CE' OR TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = 'FE' IF EVC-VAL-VENC IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'MSCTCVEVENCZ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
*AAA Valida que no se ingresen valores en "valor vencimiento" * cuando "valor vencimiento calculado en base" sea igual a * 'CO' o 'FO' 28-MAR-1991 15:07:20 IF TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = 'CO' OR *LOP-INI VALOR DE CUOTA INFORMADO * TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = ( 'FO' OR 'FP' ) TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB = ( 'FP' ) *LOP-FIN VALOR DE CUOTA INFORMADO IF EVC-VAL-VENC IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'EVCINGMODNDI' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE -1 TO EVC-VAL-VENC-LEN IN EVC-FLD MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
*DAD ini 22-MAR-1991 * Valida que cuando sea Pesos la moneda no acepte valores con deci INI-VAL-PES-DECI. MOVE EVC-CAI-IOPC IN EVC-FLD TO OPC-CAI-IOPC IN OPC. MOVE EVC-IIC-IOPC IN EVC-FLD TO OPC-IIC-IOPC IN OPC. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM COL-FIO-OPC. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'OPC NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
MOVE 'TAB' TO FIO-SIST. MOVE 'VLR' TO TAB-CIC-TTAB. MOVE '0999 ' TO TAB-CIC-CTAB. MOVE 'TAB-CIC-TABL' TO FIO-AKEY. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM GNS-FIO-TAB. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CODTVLRNEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC ELSE IF OPC-COD-VCOC IN OPC NOT = TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB GO TO FIN-VAL-PES-DECI.
MOVE EVC-VAL-VENC IN EVC-FLD TO WSS-VAL-PESO IN WSS-VARI. IF EVC-VAL-VENC IN EVC-FLD > WSS-VAL-PESO IN WSS-VARI GO TO MSG-VAL-PES-DECI.
IF EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-PES-DECI. MOVE 'COL' TO MSC-COD-SIST. MOVE 'FVAR' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC. MOVE EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC. PERFORM BUS-MSC. IF MSC-CIC-CMSC IN MSC = 'P' GO TO FIN-VAL-PES-DECI.
IF MSC-CIC-CMSC IN MSC = 'M' MOVE EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD TO WSS-VAL-PESO IN WSS-VARI IF EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD > WSS-VAL-PESO IN WSS-VARI GO TO MSG-VAL-PES-DECI.
GO TO FIN-VAL-PES-DECI. MSG-VAL-PES-DECI. MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST. MOVE 'VALNODECI' TO MSG-COD-MENS. PERFORM GET-MSG. MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS. MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. FIN-VAL-PES-DECI. *DAD fin 22-MAR-1991
*ISP SE ESCRIBE ESTE CODIGO AQUI, PUES NO ES POSIBLE AGREGAR * CODIGO ADICIONAL DESPUES DE VALIDACION AUTOMATICA MOVE EVC-CAI-IOPC IN EVC-FLD TO CYA-CAI-IOPC IN CYA. MOVE EVC-IIC-IOPC IN EVC-FLD TO CYA-IIC-IOPC IN CYA. MOVE 'AUT' TO CYA-NUM-ICAN IN CYA. MOVE 1 TO CYA-NUM-ICYA IN CYA. MOVE 'CYA-KEY-ICYA' TO FIO-AKEY. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM COL-FIO-CYA. IF FIO-STAT-OKS IF EVC-IND-CAUT IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE 'S' TO EVC-IND-CAUT IN EVC-FLD ELSE IF NOT ( EVC-IND-CAUT IN EVC-FLD = 'S' OR EVC-IND-CAUT IN EVC-FLD = 'N' ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'INDCAUTSON' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC ELSE NEXT SENTENCE ELSE MOVE SPACES TO EVC-IND-CAUT IN EVC-FLD. *ISP IF EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD > 1 AND EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMSEVEVIGUZ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
*CMP-FEC Compara Fecha de primer vencimiento vs fecha operacion MOVE OPC-NUM-DCOL IN OPC TO FEC-DEC1. MOVE OPC-NUM-MCOL IN OPC TO FEC-MEC1. MOVE OPC-NUM-SCOL IN OPC TO FEC-SEC1. MOVE OPC-NUM-ACOL IN OPC TO FEC-AEC1. MOVE EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-FEC2. MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. MOVE FEC-CMP-FEC TO FEC-CMND. PERFORM PRO-FEC. *ALD * IF NOT FEC-STAT-LES IF FEC-STAT-GRT MOVE ZEROES TO FRM-NUM-SPVE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-IND-UTPV MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-UTPV MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'FECFOPCFPVC>' TO MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG * MOVE 'FECFOPCFPVC<' TO MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
IF NOT ( EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES OR FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD > ZEROES ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMVIGUDURVZ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
IF FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES *ALD GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. GO TO CON-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. * * ISP CALCULO FECHA ULTIMO VENCIMIENTO MOVE OPC-NUM-DCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM1. MOVE OPC-NUM-MCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM2. MOVE OPC-NUM-SCOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM3. MOVE OPC-NUM-ACOL IN OPC TO FEC-ITM4. MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. MOVE 'TAB' TO MSC-COD-SIST. MOVE 'IPER' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC. MOVE FRM-IND-UTDV IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC. PERFORM BUS-MSC. PERFORM SEL-PER-FUVC. * PERFORM PRO-FEC. PERFORM CAL-FEC. MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-FUVC.
MOVE EVC-FEC-FPVC IN EVC-FLD TO FEC-FEC1. MOVE WSS-FEC-FUVC TO FEC-FEC2. MOVE 'TAB' TO MSC-COD-SIST. MOVE 'IPER' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC. MOVE EVC-IND-UTSV IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC. PERFORM BUS-MSC. MOVE FEC-FORM-FEC TO FEC-FORM. PERFORM SEL-PER-DFEC.
IF EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE ZEROES TO WSS-NUM-VIGU ELSE DIVIDE WSS-NUM-DVDO BY EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD GIVING WSS-NUM-VIGU REMAINDER WSS-NUM-REMA. ADD 1 TO WSS-NUM-VIGU. IF EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE WSS-NUM-VIGU TO EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD ELSE IF EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD NOT = WSS-NUM-VIGU MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMVIGUDURVI' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
IF WSS-NUM-REMA NOT = ZEROES MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMVIGUDURVN' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN2 MOVE FRM-SUAR-WRN TO FRM-SUAR.
MOVE WSS-NUM-DPVC TO WSS-NUM-DCO1. MOVE WSS-NUM-MPVC TO WSS-NUM-MCO1. MOVE WSS-NUM-SPVC TO WSS-NUM-SCO1. MOVE WSS-NUM-APVC TO WSS-NUM-ACO1. MOVE WSS-NUM-DUVC TO WSS-NUM-DCO2. MOVE WSS-NUM-MUVC TO WSS-NUM-MCO2. MOVE WSS-NUM-SUVC TO WSS-NUM-SCO2. MOVE WSS-NUM-AUVC TO WSS-NUM-ACO2.
IF WSS-FEC-FCO1 > WSS-FEC-FCO2 MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'FECFPVCPUVC>' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO CPT-STR1 MOVE MSG-GLS-DATA TO CPT-STR2 PERFORM CPT-BLKS MOVE CPT-STRN TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. *ALD/18-JUL-1988 CON-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. *AFRI-INI 24-JUN-2019 CAE MISMA FECHA VEN IF EVC-MSC-TCVE IN EVC-FLD = WCC-FO MOVE EVC-CAI-IOPC IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-CAI-IOPC MOVE EVC-IIC-IOPC IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-IIC-IOPC MOVE EVC-NUM-IEVC IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-NUM-IEVC MOVE EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-NUM-VIGU MOVE EVC-NUM-SPVC IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-NUM-SPVC MOVE EVC-NUM-APVC IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-NUM-APVC MOVE EVC-NUM-MPVC IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-NUM-MPVC MOVE EVC-NUM-DPVC IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-NUM-DPVC MOVE EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-NUM-SEVE MOVE EVC-IND-UTSV IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-IND-UTSV MOVE OPC-IND-AFER IN OPC TO AEV-IND-AFER MOVE EVC-NUM-DPVE IN EVC-FLD TO AEV-NUM-DPVE MOVE SCR-QIDD TO AEV-QIDD MOVE SCR-LIDD TO AEV-LIDD MOVE AEV-CMMA TO SYS-CMMA MOVE SYS-LINK TO SYS-CMND MOVE 'COLPPAEV' TO SYS-PROG MOVE AEV-TCMA TO SYS-TCMA PERFORM GNS-PRO-SYS MOVE SYS-CMMA TO AEV-CMMA IF AEV-IND-ERROR NOT = SPACES MOVE WCC-COL TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE AEV-COD-ERROR TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. *AFRI-FIN 24-JUN-2019 CAE MISMA FECHA VEN IF NOT PGM-STAT-PVC-OKS GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. IF NOT ( ( PVC-NUM-VIMI IN PVC NOT > ZEROES OR PVC-NUM-VIMI IN PVC NOT > EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD ) AND ( PVC-NUM-VIMA IN PVC NOT > ZEROES OR PVC-NUM-VIMA IN PVC NOT < EVC-NUM-VIGU IN EVC-FLD ) ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMVIGUNORNG' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-NUM-VIMI IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL1-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE SPACES TO WSS-IND-DMA1 IN WSS-VARI MOVE '-' TO WSS-GLS-GUI2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-NUM-VIMA IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL2-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE SPACES TO WSS-IND-DMA2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE WSS-MEN2 IN WSS-VARI TO FRM-MEN2 MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. * IF FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES GO TO CON-VAL-SPVE. IF ( PVC-NUM-DVMI IN PVC > ZEROES OR PVC-NUM-DVMA IN PVC > ZEROES ) MOVE FRM-IND-UTDV IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE FRM-NUM-DURV IN EVC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE1 MOVE PVC-IND-DVMI IN PVC TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE PVC-NUM-DVMI IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE2 MOVE PVC-IND-DVMA IN PVC TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE PVC-NUM-DVMA IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE3 PERFORM CMP-FEC-NFEC IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMDURVNORNG' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-NUM-DVMI IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL1-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-IND-DVMI IN PVC TO WSS-IND-DMA1 IN WSS-VARI MOVE '-' TO WSS-GLS-GUI2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-NUM-DVMA IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL2-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-IND-DVMA IN PVC TO WSS-IND-DMA2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE WSS-MEN2 IN WSS-VARI TO FRM-MEN2 GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. CON-VAL-SPVE. IF FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES GO TO CON-VAL-FLD. IF ( PVC-NUM-SPMI IN PVC > ZEROES OR PVC-NUM-SPMA IN PVC > ZEROES ) MOVE FRM-IND-UTPV IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE FRM-NUM-SPVE IN EVC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE1 MOVE PVC-IND-SPMI IN PVC TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE PVC-NUM-SPMI IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE2 MOVE PVC-IND-SPMA IN PVC TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE PVC-NUM-SPMA IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE3 PERFORM CMP-FEC-NFEC IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMSPVENORNG' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-NUM-SPMI IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL1-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-IND-SPMI IN PVC TO WSS-IND-DMA1 IN WSS-VARI MOVE '-' TO WSS-GLS-GUI2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-NUM-SPMA IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL2-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-IND-SPMA IN PVC TO WSS-IND-DMA2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE WSS-MEN2 IN WSS-VARI TO FRM-MEN2 GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. CON-VAL-FLD. *DAD ini 05-AGO-1993 IF EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD NOT > ZEROES GO TO CON-VAL-VCOC. *DAD fin 05-AGO-1993 IF ( PVC-NUM-SVMI IN PVC > ZEROES OR PVC-NUM-SVMA IN PVC > ZEROES ) MOVE EVC-IND-UTSV IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE EVC-NUM-SEVE IN EVC-FLD TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE1 MOVE PVC-IND-SVMI IN PVC TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE PVC-NUM-SVMI IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE2 MOVE PVC-IND-SVMA IN PVC TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC MOVE PVC-NUM-SVMA IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-NFEC IN WSS-VARI PERFORM SUM-FEC-NFEC MOVE FEC-FECH TO WSS-FEC-NFE3 PERFORM CMP-FEC-NFEC IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMSEVENORNG' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-NUM-SVMI IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL1-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-IND-SVMI IN PVC TO WSS-IND-DMA1 IN WSS-VARI MOVE '-' TO WSS-GLS-GUI2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-NUM-SVMA IN PVC TO WSS-NUM-VAL2-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-IND-SVMA IN PVC TO WSS-IND-DMA2 IN WSS-VARI MOVE WSS-MEN2 IN WSS-VARI TO FRM-MEN2 GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. *DAD ini 05-AGO-1993 CON-VAL-VCOC. *DAD fin 05-AGO-1993 IF PVC-COD-VCOC IN PVC NOT = OPC-COD-VCOC IN OPC AND PVC-COD-VCOC IN PVC > SPACES MOVE OPC-NUM-DCOL IN OPC TO CAM-NUM-DCAM IN CAM(1) MOVE OPC-NUM-MCOL IN OPC TO CAM-NUM-MCAM IN CAM(1) MOVE OPC-NUM-SCOL IN OPC TO CAM-NUM-SCAM IN CAM(1) MOVE OPC-NUM-ACOL IN OPC TO CAM-NUM-ACAM IN CAM(1) MOVE OPC-NUM-DCOL IN OPC TO CAM-NUM-DCAM IN CAM(2) MOVE OPC-NUM-MCOL IN OPC TO CAM-NUM-MCAM IN CAM(2) MOVE OPC-NUM-SCOL IN OPC TO CAM-NUM-SCAM IN CAM(2) MOVE OPC-NUM-ACOL IN OPC TO CAM-NUM-ACAM IN CAM(2) MOVE PVC-COD-VCOC IN PVC TO CAM-COD-VCAM IN CAM(1) MOVE OPC-COD-VCOC IN OPC TO CAM-COD-VCAM IN CAM(2) MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM TAB-FIO-CAM IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS OR CAM-IND-VIGE IN CAM NOT = 'S' MOVE ZEROES TO PVC-VAL-VVMI IN PVC MOVE ZEROES TO PVC-VAL-VVMA IN PVC MOVE ZEROES TO PVC-SGV-FMMI IN PVC MOVE ZEROES TO PVC-SGV-FMMA IN PVC ELSE MULTIPLY CAM-SGV-VCAM IN CAM BY PVC-VAL-VVMI IN PVC GIVING PVC-VAL-VVMI IN PVC MULTIPLY CAM-SGV-VCAM IN CAM BY PVC-VAL-VVMA IN PVC GIVING PVC-VAL-VVMA IN PVC MULTIPLY CAM-SGV-VCAM IN CAM BY PVC-SGV-FMMI IN PVC GIVING PVC-SGV-FMMI IN PVC MULTIPLY CAM-SGV-VCAM IN CAM BY PVC-SGV-FMMA IN PVC GIVING PVC-SGV-FMMA IN PVC.
IF NOT ( ( PVC-VAL-VVMI IN PVC NOT > ZEROES OR PVC-VAL-VVMI IN PVC NOT > EVC-VAL-VENC IN EVC-FLD ) AND ( PVC-VAL-VVMA IN PVC NOT > ZEROES OR PVC-VAL-VVMA IN PVC NOT < EVC-VAL-VENC IN EVC-FLD ) ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VALVENCNORNG' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-VAL-VVMI IN PVC TO WSS-SGV-VAL1-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE '/' TO WSS-GLS-GUI1 IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-VAL-VVMA IN PVC TO WSS-SGV-VAL2-EDT MOVE WSS-MEN1 IN WSS-VARI TO FRM-MEN2 MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC.
IF EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. MOVE 'COL' TO MSC-COD-SIST. MOVE 'FVAR' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC. MOVE EVC-IND-FVAR IN EVC-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC. PERFORM BUS-MSC. IF MSC-CIC-CMSC IN MSC = 'M' GO TO CIC-CMSC-M. IF MSC-CIC-CMSC IN MSC = 'P' GO TO CIC-CMSC-P. GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. CIC-CMSC-P. IF NOT ( ( PVC-SGV-FPMI IN PVC = ZEROES OR PVC-SGV-FPMI IN PVC NOT > EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD ) AND ( PVC-SGV-FPMA IN PVC = ZEROES OR PVC-SGV-FPMA IN PVC NOT < EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD ) ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'SGVFVARNORNG' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-SGV-FPMI IN PVC TO WSS-SGV-VAL1-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE '/' TO WSS-GLS-GUI1 IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-SGV-FPMA IN PVC TO WSS-SGV-VAL2-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE WSS-MEN1 IN WSS-VARI TO FRM-MEN2 MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. CIC-CMSC-M. IF NOT ( ( PVC-SGV-FMMI IN PVC = ZEROES OR PVC-SGV-FMMI IN PVC NOT > EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD ) AND ( PVC-SGV-FMMA IN PVC = ZEROES OR PVC-SGV-FMMA IN PVC NOT < EVC-SGV-FVAR IN EVC-FLD ) ) MOVE 'COL' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'SGVFVARNORNG' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MEN1 MOVE PVC-SGV-FMMI IN PVC TO WSS-SGV-VAL1-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE '/' TO WSS-GLS-GUI1 IN WSS-VARI MOVE PVC-SGV-FMMA IN PVC TO WSS-SGV-VAL2-EDT IN WSS-VARI MOVE WSS-MEN1 IN WSS-VARI TO FRM-MEN2 MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-FLD-EVC. * *>>>>
